column1: Uchi////But Uchi in Houston is nothing to shake a stick at. We started with some sushi
column2: and it was subpar. My Ikura wasn't bursting with the sea
column3: and my friend's uni was "alright." The oysters with shallots and lemon(?) oil were divine
column4: however. There was a chewy potato-like texture with the tang of acid and the brine of the sea.
